show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content:
Today’s show: the continuing crisis in higher education. First, we interview Harrison Wills President of the Associated… Students at Santa Monica College, where students just successfully resisted an attempt by the College trustees to establish a two-tiered fee system.
And We will hear from Robert Wilkins CEO of the East Bay YMCA on National Healthy Kids Day.
At the bottom of the hour, it’s Steve Zeltzer with Work Week Radio; we’ll conclude the show with an inteview with Jennifer Eagan President of the California Faculty Association chapter at CSU East Bay specifically dealing with the Strike Vote now being held at the CSU campuses statewide.
